resources.string: \t\tSave time in the morning by freezing shots of black coffee and black tea in advance. Just pop one in your mug and top up with boiling water for the perfect cup every time

\t\tWant to drink your morning cup of hot coffee or tea straight away? Prepare some coffee and tea ice cubes in advance and pop a couple of cubes in your mug to cool it down without diluting the taste

\t\tEnjoy ice cold water all day long by filling a water bottle half way and freezing it. Then, just top up with water throughout the day, it will be cool and refreshing almost instantly and is an especially handy trick if you are on a day trip.
